text: George Washington was the first president of the United States.
John Adams was the second President of the United States
A member of NATO agreed to help any member nation that was attacked
Donald Trump is the current president of the United States
Sean Spicer is the currrent Vice President of the United States
A nuclear bomb was dropped in Hiroshima on Aug 6 1945
John F. Kennedy was Assassinated on Nov 22 1963
